questions.question: What is the dominant color of the main body of the bag?
What material appears to be used for the bag's construction?
What is the overall shape of the main compartment of the bag?
Describe the style of the bag's carrying handles?
What is the color of the bag's shoulder strap?
Is there a zipper closure visible on the main compartment?
What type of closure is present on the front pocket?
What is the texture of the bag's outer fabric appear?
Does the bag appear to have any additional pockets or compartments on its exterior?
Describe the visible hardware on the shoulder strap?
What is the apparent finish of the bag's zippers?
What seems to be the primary function suggested by the bag's design?
Is there a visible logo or branding on the bag?
Describe the style of the bag's shoulder strap attachment to the bag?
What is the overall size of the bag (relative to other products)?
